title: Flashlight, "MityLite Submersible", ca. 1990
markings: Molded in red plastic body, painted silver: "MityLite (tm) Submersible"
dimensions: Overall: L: 16 x W: 4 x D: 2 cm (6 5/16 x 1 9/16 x 13/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Barbara and Max Pine
description: Red plastic faceted body in form of pen, with pen clip end.  Body fitted with clear faceted cylindrical threaded lens covering lamp; small circular magnet at opposite end; removable black rubber cap with clear plastic curved rod (Litebender attachment) fits over lens to make flashlight function in manner of fiber optics, showing narrow, bright, focused beam.

exhibitions.title: IDEO Selects: Works from the Permanent Collection

tombstone.epitaph:
Flashlight, "MityLite Submersible", ca. 1990.
ca. 1990. Plastic, xenon bulb. Gift of Barbara and Max Pine. 1993-133-18.
